attributes.action: Theresa May. sack any MP who tries to revolt agains't brexit
attributes.additional_details: In parliament there is an attempt to revolt agains't the UK's decision to leave the EU..This week in the house of commons http://www.express.co.uk/news/politics/740081/Brexit-News-Theresa-May-Article-50-Tory-MPs-revolt-Anna-Soubry-Labour-motion
attributes.background: We the people will be heard once and for all..we again are sending out a clear message, to the PM , sack any MP who tries to overthrow the will of the people.They are not suppose to be agains't us, they are suppose to be working for us.High time they realise the public pay their wages.

rejection.details: The Government and Parliament are not responsible for sacking MPs because of their views or opinions.
